author: Jeff Stein
title: Trump pushes $2 trillion infrastructure package in next coronavirus bill, saying it must be ‘VERY BIG & BOLD’ - The Washington Post
description: Trump pushes $2 trillion infrastructure package in next coronavirus bill, saying it must be ‘VERY BIG & BOLD’ The Washington Post Trump calls for $2T infrastructure bill as 'Phase 4' of coronavirus response Fox News Trump says another coronavirus stimulus sho…
content: President Trump said Tuesday that a $2 trillion infrastructure package should be part of Congresss next response to the coronavirus pandemic, reviving a 2016 campaign pledge to ramp up construction projects despite public health guidance that Americans should… [+5497 chars]
